About me.Descripcion-Sobre-Mi: Hello, I am Luis Miguel Pineda. I am a responsible, proactive person with leadership skills. I have a quick learning ability and experience in document writing and program management, especially in Excel.

Curriculum.Bachillerato-Descripcion: I completed my high school education with a focus on Business Management, acquiring skills in leadership and communication. This period sparked my interest in Project Management.
Curriculum.Industrial-descripcion: Graduated in Industrial Engineering with knowledge in process optimization, quality management, and continuous improvement. I developed skills in data analysis and strategic planning, applied to operational efficiency.
Curriculum.Excel-Descripcion: Skills in task automation, data analysis, and creating macros to optimize processes and improve operational efficiency
Curriculum.Management-Descripcion: Experience in project planning, execution, and follow-up. Skilled in managing resources, meeting deadlines, and optimizing team productivity.
Curriculum.AQL-Descripcion: Ensuring product quality through sampling and evaluation, guaranteeing compliance with standards and regulations.
Curriculum.Descripcion-Repre: I supported the implementation and maintenance of quality management systems, ensuring compliance with industrial standards and regulations, as part of my professional internship.
Curriculum.Descripcion-Tipiel: Quality assistant at a petroleum engineering company, supporting the implementation of quality management systems, process supervision, and audit report preparation. I collaborated in continuous improvement and staff training on quality practices.
Curriculum.Descripcion-Capacity: Responsible for receiving and verifying goods, inventory management, and quality control. Coordinated with suppliers and warehouse staff to ensure efficient product flow. Experienced in inventory management systems and preparing receiving reports.
Curriculum.Descripcion-Cosmax: In my current role, I create and maintain quality records, manage non-conformance reports, and propose corrective actions to ensure regulatory compliance and improve processes.
